overview: The world is overpopulated with myriads of demons. Permanently influencing hydrochemical and petropolitical singularities, they give rise to xeno-disturbances, provoke pestilence, plague, and wars. The lord of the wind and epidemics - Pazuzu is the most powerful of them. Pazuzu feeds on dust, which, according to Kabbalah, is equal to the absence of God. The rise of Pazuzu is the apotheosis of apotropy, a sign of a new stage of the Anthropocene.
title: PAZUZU RISING: closed system xenology
